titleStmt.title: Account [about 248-246 BC]
titleStmt.author: Zenon, son of Agreophon, of Caunus, 1 in Pap.Lugd.Bat. XXI, p. 332-333

revisionDesc.change: Pull translation out of APIS record.

listBibl.bibl: P.Col. IV 75 P.Col.Zen. II 75 Plate of the lower portion in P.Col. IV facing p. 44; about the date Reekmans, BL VI p. 31 and Skeat, P.Lond. VII 2004, intr. Reprinted by R. Scholl, "Corpus der ptolemaischen Sklaventexte" (1990) no. 105; G.F. Franko, BASP 25 (1988) 68-70, dates to 249-248 or later, and considers the writing on the back without relation to the front and perhaps older; explanation of line 15 (the totals were not simply arithmetic errors) and correction to line 21 by Clarysse, personal communication. See BL XI p. 66 with reference to corrections in lines 21, 28, 29, 31 and interpretation by Reekmans
